data.text: @NMDOH Because you left the door open for this I have to ask.  Why lift the mask mandate when the immunocompromised guide at the bottom shows that 500+ epidemiologists consider “stop routinely wearing a face mask” as a high risk situation? https://t.co/7v67PfktOh

@NMDOH Stop COVID spread by avoiding close contact and using free app Bost instead to safely communicate with people at same place. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/2tSRgcfKKn
